the pokemon hunting fever with the latest game from nintendo pokemon corps and niantic labs called pokemon go seems to have caused quite a lot of public opinion because of the trend of this game various negative issues are milling about through various social media several individuals claim that pokemon go is a product that is deliberately created to destroy certain religions what is surprising is that the name pokemon go is interpreted as the word i am jewish which is said to be taken from the syriac language as well as the meaning of the names of pokemon monsters such as pikachu which means be jewish and the lizard monster named charmander which means god it is weak not a few lay people who believe this stimulate argument even so the argument was immediately dismissed by pokemon lovers who have studied the story from the beginning as quoted from the kaskus com forum as follows pokemon is taken from the word pocket monster monsters in a pocket the theme of pokemon collect and train monsters a fictional world where on earth everything is created by pokemon and pokemon are scattered everywhere instead of ordinary animals to become the greatest trainer and master pikachu derived from the combination of the words pika and chu pika is the name of a japanese rat like animal while chu itself is a word used to describe the sound of a mouse a kind of cit cit here in essence yes a mouse shaped monster raichu the difference is rai is a kanji reading which means lightning those who play yugioh know raigeki meaning lightning attack or does anyone know the god raijin raichu means maybe the thunder that makes the sound of a mouse charmander derived from the english char which can mean charcoal or burn to charcoal and salamander or fire lizard because it is red a salamander that can burn to charcoal charmeleon same only with the combination of the words chameleon the lizard that can change color bro charizard same the ending is lizard meaning lizard so now it is clear right

regarding the finding of candy snacks containing drugs a number of people are worried such as the pekanbaru legislature the council asked the police disperindag bpom and other related agencies enounce to act immediately and go to the field to ensure that the snacks for children suspected of containing drugs were not circulating in pekanbaru city this is what worries us and the public so it must be anticipated as soon as possible so that it does not enter our area for this reason the police have been able to move down to the field to ensure that pacifiers suspected of containing drugs are not circulating in pekanbaru trace every trader and producer said member of commission ii dprd pekanbaru city roem diani dewi friday 10 3 this pks politician said that if the candy case which was indicated to contain drugs was true then the police were asked to be firm and enforce the existing rules do not let the goods have been circulated before taking action because in some stalls it seems that they are already circulating and we will see for ourselves said roem in addition said roem if it is proven that it is true and positive for containing drugs law enforcement authorities are asked to be firm and give appropriate punishment to the food distributor or supplier it is the perpetrators of this crime who need to be dealt with it is clear that this is damaging the nation s generation by incorporating harmful substances into snacks especially for children said roem furthermore roem also hopes that as a form of anticipation the government be it bpom diskes and schools need to work together to disseminate information to students about the dangers of drugs we hope that students are given an understanding of the dangers of this drug especially if it is packaged in an attractive form like the alleged pacifier containing drugs it is very difficult to be recognized by the public especially children i think the school also plays a role and should not allow traffickers roaming outside schools whose health and safety are not guaranteed explained roem the finding of pacifiers suspected of containing drugs is reportedly being traded in a number of elementary schools and kindergartens tk in the city of surabaya even to confirm the case the surabaya east java government and other related parties such as the bpom are reportedly conducting an investigation

the muslim community was shocked by the news about toothbrushes made of boar bristles one of the markers is the content of the toothbrush bristle which is listed on the packaging the word bristle is then interpreted as a sea urchin as a result many muslims are worried about using a toothbrush on the market quoted from the halalmui org page lppom mui explains the term bristle means stiff hair or fiber this definition refers to the websters dictionary so all stiff hair including stiff beards palm fibers pine leaves fall into the bristle category in the industrial world bristle is often used as a material for making brushes and brushes including toothbrushes bristle materials can come from animals such as pigs horses goats considerably or synthetic fibers such as nylon and silicone to emphasize what bristles are used on a toothbrush usually the term bristle will be written in the product name for example boar bristle brush which means pig bristle brush boar means wild boar or wild boar if you find a toothbrush with the above sentence on the packaging then the toothbrush is declared forbidden to use this means that the product is a brush that uses wild boar bristles toothbrushes can also use boar bristles wrote lppom mui quoted from halalmui org wednesday november 2 2016 however not all toothbrushes that contain the term bristle in their packaging must be made from pig bristles there are already many manufacturers that use horse goat camel hair as well as nylon and silicone fibers in their toothbrush products when there is no information on the source of the material at least a simple method can be used to determine whether it is made from animal hair or not the method in question is to burn the material if it smells like burning hair or horns better leave it alone materials from plastic or coconut fiber do not emit such a distinctive odor when burned wrote lppom mui

garuda news people who are hit by a stroke attack suddenly and do not see the place and condition where they fall such as from the wc in the workplace or in the bedroom usually people who experience a sudden stroke all the blood vessels to the brain will slowly burst gradually little by little a little and you need to remember and know that to overcome when you have a sudden stroke and the defeat first thing you do is do not be nervous panic if the victim is at the scene such as in the bathroom bedroom living room etc remember not to be moved to another place where the victim fell because this can worsen the condition of the stroke sufferer which causes it to accelerate the rupture of blood vessels throughout the brain and do not let the stroke sufferer fall for the second time for first aid when affected by a stroke the right thing you have to do is to remove the victim s blood using a needle that has been burned on condition that the needle is sterile which is then inserted into each fingertip of the second thumb until the blood comes out 1 2 drops if the blood does not come out it can be done by massaging it until it comes out after which the victim will wake up after a few minutes if the victim s mouth is tilted pull the earlobe until it is red and immediately pierce the bottom of the earlobe with a sterile needle until the blood comes out 1 2 drops after the victim was conscious and his mouth had recovered then he was taken to the hospital doctor usually people who have a stroke will have their blood vessels burst more quickly due to shocks on the way to the hospital or doctor the person may fall unconscious again and will usually be disabled or paralyzed we must remember to remove from the finger of the person who has had a stroke then we can help that person from stroke

the issue of the iphone 6 plus which users claim is easy to bend has attracted great attention from the world however according to an american magazine consumer reports this issue is actually too exaggerated according to a ubergizmo report consumer reports has conducted a self test to test the iphone 6 plus they also included other devices namely the iphone 5s iphone 6 lg g3 samsung galaxy note 3 and htc one m8 for comparison the experiment was carried out with an instron compression machine which puts pressure on the center of the device with various pressure variations as a result htc one m8 and iphone 6 were found to be the weakest devices they are only able to withstand a load of 31 7 kg as well before bending then the iphone 6 plus followed with the ability to hold 40 8 kg the strongest were the lg g3 and galaxy note 3 which held up to 59 kg and 68 kg respectively based on this discovery consumer reports dares to state that the iphone 6 and plus are not as bad as the news circulating they may not be the strongest phones on the market but concerns about serious structural design errors in the iphone 6 and plus seem overblown said consumer reports previously apple had also shown a test facility at its factory to ease the rumors that were being talked about through the hashtag bendgate on various social media they have also explained that the iphone 6 and plus are made of strong steel or titanium inserts the cupertino company itself has also formulated the aluminum it uses with glass ions to make it stronger
